description:
The Qi-Cat country is in chaos due to the dark power, Weslie and his companions accidentally saved Princess Haoyue of the Qi-Cat country, in order to help Princess Haoyue, they set off to the Qi-Cat country, but unexpectedly, except for Lazy Goat and Wolffy, their companions are controlled by the Queen`s darkness to be their enemies. Along the way, the powerless Lazy Goat and Wolffy are rounded up by their fellow cats, can they wake up their companions with the love in their hearts? And Princess Haoyue, who is travelling along the way, seems to have something on her mind, what is the dark energy hidden behind?
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之异国大营救

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Yiguo Da Yingjiu
喜羊羊与灰太狼之异国大营救
